roleset.name: combine with a similar molecule to form a dimer

example.name: example with volitional agent
example.text: Therefore, to determine if the observed dimerization-dependent LRP5c signaling requires membrane localization, we dimerized non-targeted LRP5c.

example.name: molecules 1 and 2
example.text: Histone H2AZ dimerizes with a novel variant H2B and is enriched at repetitive DNA in Trypanosoma brucei.

example.name: example with result
example.text: The unsaturated hydrocarbon butadiene (C4H6) dimerizes to 4-vinylcyclohexan (C8H12).
